title: Create /update skill for standardized story management
description: Create an /update skill that any Claude (interactive or Ralph) uses to add stories to the PRD. Auto-detects if Ralph is running and routes to update.json or directly to index.json + stories/. This ensures all Claudes use the same interface instead of manual file manipulation.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create skills/update/ directory with SKILL.md + workflows/
SKILL.md explains when to use /update vs manual edits
Create workflows/add-story.md for adding new stories
Create workflows/add-bug.md for adding bug reports
Create workflows/update-story.md for modifying existing stories
Auto-detect Ralph running: check for lock file or pgrep for ralph tee process
If Ralph running: write to prd-json/update.json with newStories array
If Ralph NOT running: write directly to stories/ and update index.json
Always convert string criteria to {text, checked: false} objects
Create scripts/add-story.sh that handles the detection and routing logic
Test: Run /update while Ralph is running - verify goes to update.json
Test: Run /update while Ralph is NOT running - verify goes to index.json
